name: Another Fight
description:
Summary

Lucas, you've woke up injured. You find that your village has been invaded by conquerers. You can't do anything about it, the best thing for you to do is to escape in the shadows! 

Eleanor, you saw a man being chased and killed by invaders, and now they coming for you! Slice them, shoot them! Get to the leading tower and destroy the source! 

Sophia, you realized your father broke his promise of keeping peace as you saw a woman got killed in front of the castle and burning smoke from nearby villages. Take the bombs, get them to the weak spots, and end the madness once and for all! 

This game is made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 with the theme An End is a new Beginning. What makes the game fit the theme you ask? Well each journeys character go through they will influence the others' journeys, aka an end of one's journey will be another one's new journey 

Control

WASD or Arrow keys - 8 Directions Walk

Left-Click or Z key - Punch or Swing Sword

Right-Click or X key - Crossbow Shoot

Credits

Game Engine - Godot 3.5.1

Art - GIMP and Pixilart

Sound Effects - Minecraft

Texture fonts - Electronic Blueberry

Lucas Level Music - Dark Ambience Loop by Iwan Gabovitch or qubodup on Open Game Art

Eleanor Level Music - Battle Theme from Pixel Sphere by cynicmusic

Sophia Level Music - Not Powerful Enough by Spring Spring on Open Game Art

End of the Game - Space(Orchestra) by lasercheese on Open Game Art
